summary: Diff implements separate Principal Check-In and Check-Out pages with dedicated routes/navigation, adds backend state for check-ins/outs plus a migration module, updates KPI activity label from “QPC” to “Qur’anic Parenting Center” in KPI definitions/table headers, and updates the daily submission UI to send a placeholder time implying backend server-time stamping. Some backend acceptance-criteria items (server Time.now usage and admin/principal query methods) cannot be confirmed from the truncated backend diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Optional free-text “Notes” (detail) field stored with Check-In/Check-Out events.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-7/REQ-8 require storing a server timestamp and separate submissions; they do not request storing an additional text detail field with the event.
evidence: backend/main.mo (new types CheckIn/CheckOut include detail : Text)
backend/migration.mo (checkIns/checkOuts map values include { time : Int; detail : Text })
